title: Revealing smoothly text in flash
content: I 'd like to create an animation similar to the one shown on the right (the typeradio.org logo) for a lettering-looking logo (where there are almost no edges and thus no starting or ending point). I can guess it's made on Flash with several masks running over the logo, but I was wondering whether there is another way to do it ... (with another tool perhaps - such as After Effects - and then exported to .swf)
author: gtrianta
